title: Wout van Aert ‘Better Than Hoped’ in CX Season Debut, but Confirms Worlds Are off Agenda
content:
Belgian ace makes definite decision not to compete in cyclocross world championships as he goes all-in on spring.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert ‘Better Than Hoped’ in CX Season Debut, but Confirms Worlds Are off Agenda on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
